thread.title: KPK arrests 1 new suspect in bribery case for railway challenge
thread.title_full: KPK arrests 1 new suspect in bribery case for railway challenge

author: world today news
title: KPK arrests 1 new suspect in bribery case for railway challenge
text:
Jakarta –
KPK introduced PPK DJKA Ministry of Transport (Kemenhub) Cirebon Kroya Double Observe Development September 2017-2020 Yofi Okatrisza as a suspect within the case a bribe of the Director Basic of Railways, Ministry of Transport, relating to the development of railway traces within the areas of South Sulawesi, Central Java, West Java and Java-Sumatra for the price range yr 2018-2022. Yofi was instantly detained.
“On this case, a number of witnesses have been examined and associated proof was launched. After discovering sufficient proof, the investigators recognized YO because the Dedication Officer of BTP Class 1 Central Java which grew to become BTP Semarang in 2017 to 2021 as a suspect,” stated Director KPK will study Asep Guntur at a press convention at KPK Pink and White Constructing, Jalan Kuningan Persada, Thursday (13/6/2024).
“For investigation functions, suspected YO was detained for the primary 20 days from June 13 to July 2, 2024 on the KPK Department Detention Heart,” he stated.
Asep stated that this case was a growth of the PT proprietor’s bribery case. Putra Agung Palace, Dion Renato Sugiarto to PPK at BTP Semarang, Bernard Hasibuan and CEO of BTP Class 1 Semarang, Putu Sumarjaya. Asep stated Yofi was PPK on a number of tasks in Central Java.
Asep defined that Yofi is the PPK for a number of tasks, together with the improve of the Purwokerto-Kroya railway line in 2017. Then, the Cross Banjar-Kroya railway line in 2018, and the Cross Banjar-Kroya railway line in 2020 .
Not solely that, the 2019 Cirebon-Kroya double monitor development actions as much as PPK Space II embrace the development or growth or upkeep or renovation of development services and prepare operations. Asep stated that Yofi, in finishing up the challenge, was suspected of rigging the public sale course of by profitable over Dion’s corporations.
“For this help, PPK, together with Suspect YO, obtained charges from companions together with DRS within the quantity of 10% to twenty% of the worth of the allotted work bundle ,” stated Asep.
Asep revealed the proportion of charges from companions when Suspect YO served as PPK, together with:
1) For PPK it’s 4%
2) For BPK it’s 1% to 1.5%.
3) For ITJEN of the Ministry of Transport, it’s 0.5%.
4) For Provide Working Group 0.5%.
5) For BTP CEO it’s 3%.
The Corruption Eradication Fee (KPK) had beforehand named 13 suspects, whereas the identification of one other particular person was not disclosed by the Corruption Eradication Committee. So, the overall variety of suspects up to now is 14 folks. They’re divided into teams of bribe takers and bribe givers.
The 12 suspects on this case beforehand described are:
The Giver
1. DIN (Dion Renato Sugiarto), Director of PT IPA (Patra Agung Palace)
2. MUH (Muchamad Hikmat), PT DF Director (Dwifarita Fajarkharisma)
3. YOS (Yoseph Ibrahim), Director of PT KA Properti Administration sd. February 2023
4. PAR (Parjono), VP PT KA Property Administration
5. Asta Danika (AD), Director PT Bhakti Karya Utama (BKU)
6. Zulfikar Fahmi (ZF), Director PT Putra Kharisma Sejahtera (PKS).
Recipient occasion
1. HNO (Harno Trimadi), Director of Railway Infrastructure
2. BEN (Bernard Hasibuan), PPK BTP Jabagteng
3. PTU (Putu Sumarjaya), Head of BTP Jabagteng
4. AFF (Achmad Affandi), PPK BPKA South Sulawesi
5. FAD (Fadliansyah), PPK Railway Infrastructure Upkeep
6. SYN (Syntho Pirjani Hutabarat), PPK BTP Jabagbar.
